name: Darkness Escape
description:
Darkness Escape is a flood escape game where you must fly from platform to platform to escape the darkness that is rising below you, trying to consume your light. The platforms are infinitely generated, I really hope you enjoy the game :D 

Also, the song for when you are actually playing (not in main menu or death screen) was generated by an AI because I could not figure out how to make a song that fit it in piano so I just got one that sounded good from an ai song generator... even though it is not a piano song... Anyways, this is the first game I have ever finished and my second project ever, so expect it to not be amazing, but I think it is pretty good (although I am definitely biased).
